Source.Name: kdewebkit
Source.Summary: Integration of the HTML rendering engine WebKit
Source.Description: This library provides KDE integration of the QtWebKit library. If you are using QtWebKit in your KDE application, you are encouraged to use this layer instead of using the QtWebKit classes directly.

Package.Name: kdewebkit
Package.Summary: Integration of the HTML rendering engine WebKit
Package.Description: This library provides KDE integration of the QtWebKit library. If you are using QtWebKit in your KDE application, you are encouraged to use this layer instead of using the QtWebKit classes directly.
